content: निरृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Decay, destruction, dissolution. {@--2@} A calamity, evil, bane, adversity; सा हि लोकस्य निरृतिः <ls>U. 5. 30.</ls> {@--3@} An imprecation, a curse. {@--4@} Death or destruction personified, the goddess of death or destruction, the regent of the southwestern quarter; <ls>Ms. 11. 119.</ls> {@--5@} The bottom of the earth.
